address: via Nazionale 30, località San Giorgio al Tagliamento
description: A new generation is now at the helm in this warm and elegant restaurant decorated with a profusion of wood, adding a more modern touch to the cuisine while maintaining its regional character and excellent local ingredients. The menu has its own unique flavour thanks to the option of numerouscicchetti(tapas-style snacks) options available, either in half- or full portions, enabling guests to create their own menu.
